gr.auth.csd.taskmanager

Class Process

  • java.lang.Object
    • gr.auth.csd.taskmanager.Process

  • public class Process
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that holds information about the processes that are active on the device. Created by Steve Laskaridis on 1/5/2015.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Debug.MemoryInfo memoryInfo
      An instance of the Debug's MemoryInfo class, that holds information about the memory that each process has allocated.
      private ActivityManager.RunningAppProcessInfo theProcess
      An instance of the ActivityManager's RunningAppProcessInfo class, that holds information about the process.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Process(ActivityManager.RunningAppProcessInfo theProcess)
      Ctor that needs only the RunningAppProcessInfo field as a parameter.
      Process(ActivityManager.RunningAppProcessInfo theProcess, Debug.MemoryInfo memoryInfo)
      Ctor that needs both this class's fields as parameters.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Debug.MemoryInfo getMemoryInfo()
      Getter for the MemoryInfo of the process.
      int getPid()
      Abstraction, in order to get just the PID of the process (held in the RunningAppProcessInfo field)
      java.lang.String getProcessName()
      Abstraction, in order to get just the name of the process (held in the RunningAppProcessInfo field)
      java.lang.String toLongString()
      Method that returns a more verbose version of the serialized "Process" instance.
      java.lang.String toString()
